FuncDef: This command defines the key of the index of the mini-table. If key information is changed while summary is administratively enabled (no shutdown), the filter summary mini-table is flushed and recreated with different key information. Log packets received during the reconfiguration time will be handled as if summary was not active.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that received log packets are summarized based on the destination IPv4, IPv6, or MAC address.
Specifies that received log packets are summarized based on the source IPv4, IPv6 or MAC address.
